amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language to prohibit funds to develop, propose, finalize, implement, enforce, or administer any regulation that would establish new financial responsibility requirements pursuant to section 108(b) of the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in House Report 114-638 to strike section 430 of Interior Appropriations bill for FY 17.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Becerra amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 236 (Roll no. 430).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Becerra amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 236 (Roll no. 430).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Becerra.
